approvalModal.title: You need first to approve a spending limit.

capCollateralModal.title: Collateral Cap
capCollateralModal.description: The total amount of {{assetName}} you provide as collateral exceeds {{cap}} {{assetName}}. This limit is set because the contracts are not audited yet and we want to cap the risk. Please, bear in mind that the alpha version is meant just to demonstrate the functioning of the protocol in real conditions. A fully fledged version will be available soon.

secondPage.description:
Ever borrowed in DeFi? Taking out a loan at 5%
and paying 15% shortly after is an everyday reality.

Manually comparing loan providers is a tedious task,
refinancing as rates change is expensive in gas and time.
secondPage.descriptionMobile:
Ever borrowed in DeFi?
Taking out a loan at 5% and
paying 15% shortly after is
an everyday reality.

Manually comparing loan
providers is a tedious task,
refinancing as rates change
is expensive in gas and time.

thirdPage.description:
Routing your loan through Fuji ensures you get
the best borrow rate, aggregated across all providers.

Better opportunity? The protocol automatically
refinances the whole pool of loans to the new lowest APR.

Routing your loan through Fuji
ensures you get
the best borrow
rate, aggregated across all
providers.

Better opportunity?
The protocol automatically
refinances the whole pool of
loans to the new lowest APR.

initBorrow.liquidityNotification: Liquidity for this transaction comes from
initBorrow.helper: Liquidity for this transaction comes from <1>{{provider}}</1>
initBorrow.insufficientBorrow: Please, type the amount at least 1
initBorrow.collateralRequiredAmount: Please, type the amount you want to provide as collateral
initBorrow.insufficientCollateral: Please, provide at least <1>{{neededCollateral}}</1> as collateral!

successModal.transactionDescription: Your transaction has been processed, you can check now your position.

approvalModal.content: You need first to approve a spending limit.

validationModal.title: Input Validation
validationModal.content: Incorect amount of collateral and/or borrow amount!

howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.description: With Fuji you reduce your loan expenses by <1>~10%</1>. The protocol constantly <1>monitors</1> borrow markets and automatically <1>refinances</1> its debt positions at the best available rates.

healthFactor.title: Health Factor
healthFactor.tooltip:
The health factor represents the safety of your loan derived from the proportion of collateral versus amount borrowed.
<1>Keep it above 1 to avoid liquidation.

currentLoanToValue.title: Current Loan-to-Value
currentLoanToValue.tooltip:
The Maximum Loan-to-Value ratio represents the maximum borrow limit.
A max. LTV of {{threshold}}% means the user can borrow up to ${{threshold}} in the principal currency for every $100 worth of collateral.
<5>With LTV above {{ threshold }}% they risk a liquidation.

apr.tooltip: Live fetching borrow rates from underlying protocols that provide liquidity.

disclaimerPopup.title: Safety Notice
disclaimerPopup.description: Please be advised that the current version of the contracts isn't fully audited. Use at your own risk.
disclaimerPopup.checkDescription: By moving forward, you accept our <1/> <2>Terms of Use</2> and confirm that you understand the risks

collateralForm.tooltip: <4>Supply</4> more {{collateralAssetName}} as collateral or <4>withdraw</4> what is not locked for your borrows.

debtForm.tooltip: <4>Repay</4> {{borrowAssetName}} from your wallet balance or <4> borrow</4> more from it against your free collateral.

errors.insufficientAmount: Please, type an amount you like to {{action}}
errors.insufficientBalanceToBorrow: You can borrow max <1>{{leftToBorrow}} {{borrowAssetName}}</1>. Provide more collateral!

flashClose.title: Flash Close
flashClose.description: Use a flash loan to repay your debt in a single transaction.
flashClose.tooltip: Repay your debt position from your collateral by using a flash loan. Fee: 1%

dialog.description: You are about to repay your debt by selling part of your collateral. We are going to use a flash loan for that purpose. <1 /><2 /> <3>Fee: 1%</3>
